titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3372) to provide a process for ensuring the United States does not default on its obligations.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3372) to provide a process for ensuring the United States does not default on its obligations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Honda. Petition No: 113-6.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3372 (Pay Our Bills Act).
